Frequently Asked Questions

  1. How do I connect a keyboard and mouse?
    • Be certain that you are using a mini- A to standard-A USB adapter. Mini-B adapters will not work without additional hardware modifications. Recommended peripherals can be found on the product details page.
    • It is also necessary to build support for USB OTG host mode into your kernel.
    • The port can only supply 100mA, so you might need a powered hub for power-hungry keyboards and mice
